title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.130 - Five Points Correctional Facility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.130 - Five Points Correctional Facility

State Regulations
(a) There shall be in the department an
institution to be known as Five Points Correctional Facility which shall be
located in the Town of Romulus in Seneca County and which shall consist of
property under the jurisdiction of the department. (b) Five Points Correctional Facility shall
be a correctional facility for males 18 years of age or older. (c) Five Points Correctional Facility shall
be classified as a maximum security facility, to be used as a general
confinement facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
100.130

Amended

New

York State Register July 22, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 29, eff. 7/22/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
